modName: Like a Boss     - New Mounts Mod -
summary: Cause ponies are for kids.. yeah. So here's a bunch of new mounts to ride.
descriptionHtml:
Recommended Add-On:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13530][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/13530-1-1332544815.jpg[/img][/url]
Easily mark any Like a Boss mount for followers to ride.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1332547016.png[/img]
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9y9Y2c9Z7c&feature=youtu.be][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-5-1329696764.jpg[/img][/url]

Tiny is a hungry little fella with a taste for cabbage.
He's friendly too.
LOCATION:Whiterun
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-2-1329696764.jpg[/img]

Legs is just plain to lazy to fight or run away.
Walking aint his thing too.
But swims.. Like a Boss
LOCATION:Windhelm
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEIbJIU73yU&feature=youtu.be][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-3-1329696764.jpg[/img][/url]

Tina is nice as in bite your head off nice.
Hates water with passion too.
LOCATION:Riverwood
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-4-1329696764.jpg[/img]

Moose&Carrie are going through some slight relationship issues.
Guess thats why they are at opposite side of Riverwood stream.
LOCATION:Riverwood
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1329696763.jpg[/img]

Dracolich is the newest addition to Like a Boss pack of misfit mounts.
You can find it by the tower where the first dragon got slayed, perhaps lured by deaths energy.
Mount it and ride.. Like a Boss
LOCATION:Wilderness
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1329817093.jpg[/img]
Christine is a handful. She likes only dogs and if you can't control her..
All else is lunch.
LOCATION: To close to Whiterun
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1329990818.jpg[/img]
She's not your friendly neighborhood spidey
Irritable, mean and ugly,Arachne is a Boss.
Oh yeah.. and she bites, so be careful. *evil cackle*
LOCATION: Morthal swamp
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1330151785.jpg[/img]
Bears are bears. Can be a handful and very useful.
But seems these two are just vevy sveepy.
LOCATION: Shore of Windhelm river; Near Hunters Rest
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1331327755.jpg[/img]
Cool to the bone, Icemongous is a ride that will chill your enemies to the bone.
Be careful it can also chill your.. yeah..
LOCATION: Windhelm hill

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1331978191.jpg[/img]
Just nasty..

LOCATION: Morthal swamp
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

Rambling DESCRIPTION and some locations:

Started as a "have a laugh" mod in essence, but i really liked it. So figured.. hey share it man.
It will spawn TIny, a friendly mammoth, in the cabbage field in front of Whiterrun.
And you get to ride him.
Thats it, have fun. Like a Boss
Ok and cause true Boss don't swim, he gets others to swim for him. You got Legs chillin under Windhelm bridge.
Tina is bit fragile and hates water.. but you'll be riding like a Boss. That is if you spot her by Riverwood bridge that is.

****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
AN FYI: Figure if you dont know, you can make all mounts bigger or smaller in game.
Bring out console, click on them and write SetScale and any number here. (1.1; 0.7; 10; 2.. whatever). This sticks with saves/loads so you dont worry about doing it all the time.
Saying this cause i play with my guy scaled to 1.09 so if you play smaller or shorter character this is a useful command so you get sitting Like a Boss ;)
****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

SHENANIGANS :

[b]Number One[/b]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1330044745.png[/img]

Yeah.. sharing the Boss perks with your follower.. Like a Boss.

[b]Number Two[/b]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/9464-1-1330676792.jpg[/img]

Yup, more followers and more riding buddies hehe


























































































Updates -->>Only for eyes of True Bosses<<--
[b]1.0a Icemongous[/b] - Will be more forgiving if you hit him in combat

[b]1.0c[/b]
The Bears - Faulty folder structure, bears would not appear in game. FIXED

[b]ALL 1.0b[/b]
For gameplay purpose i quit on the "get back to where found" behavior.
All mounts will stay by you as do owned horses.
Some will be passive, some will help you in fights.
Mononokes wolf Tina got a speed boost.
Moose & Carrie's HP has been upped and fixed wrong race Moose had so he's ridable now
ADDENDUM- The Bears/Arachne 1.0b -- Removed aggressive behavior because of potential animation issues.

[b]Mononoke 1.0a[/b]
Forgot to do a proper boundbox in earlier version, fixed now. Some tweaks to swimming, lack of proper animations makes it look bad but at least you are not glitching out like by vanilla settings.
author: fLokii
